commit.message:
Rollup merge of #46134 - GuillaumeGomez:negative-traits, r=QuietMisdreavus

Display negative traits implementation

Fixes #45816.

r? @QuietMisdreavus

+pub struct Foo;
+
+// @has foo/struct.Foo.html
